properties.Name: CustomerEmail
properties.Description: The customer email address(s) of the associated email type for the indicated period.

Columns.Name: EmailTypeId

Columns.Name: PeriodEndTimestamp

Columns.Name: PreferenceId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Preference.

Columns.Name: CustomerEmailNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the customer email address.
